import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; // Importation d'Axios import Headline from '../../layouts/form/headline'; import ProgressBar from './progressbare'; import Footerform from '../../layouts/form/footerform'; function FormulaireDesignCircularity() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const formRef = useRef(null); // Référence au formulaire // Gestion des envois de données const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(formRef.current); const data = { DesignofCircularity: { postalAddress: formData.get('postalAddress'), emailAddress: formData.get('emailAddress'), webAddress: formData.get('webAddress'), partNumbers: formData.get('partNumbers'), manualRemovalBattery: formData.get('manualRemovalBattery'), manualDisassemblyBatteryPack: formData.get('manualDisassemblyBatteryPack'), }, batterySafetyRequirements: { extinguishingAgent: formData.get('extinguishingAgent'), safetyMeasures: formData.get('safetyMeasures'), }, recycledAndRenewableContent: { preConsumerRecycledNickel: formData.get('preConsumerRecycledNickel'), preConsumerRecycledCobalt: formData.get('preConsumerRecycledCobalt'), preConsumerRecycledLithium: formData.get('preConsumerRecycledLithium'), preConsumerRecycledLead: formData.get('preConsumerRecycledLead'), postConsumerRecycledNickel: formData.get('postConsumerRecycledNickel'), postConsumerRecycledCobalt: formData.get('postConsumerRecycledCobalt'), renewableContentShare: formData.get('renewableContentShare'), postConsumerRecycledLeadShare: formData.get('postConsumerRecycledLeadShare'), postConsumerRecycledLithiumShare: formData.get('postConsumerRecycledLithiumShare'), }, endOfLifeInformation: { wastePrevention: formData.get('wastePrevention'), wasteBatteries: formData.get('wasteBatteries'), separateCollection: formData.get('separateCollection'), } }; try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5555/api/design-circularity', data); navigate('/batterymaterials'); } catch (error) { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'envoi des données :', error); } }; const handleNext = async () => { // Soumettre le formulaire if (formRef.current) { const form = formRef.current; await handleSubmit({ preventDefault: () => {} }); // Rediriger après la soumission réussie navigate('/batterymaterials'); } }; const handlePrevious = () => { navigate('/supplychain'); }; const handleMouseEnter = (type) => { setTooltips((prev) => ({ ...prev, [type]: true })); }; const handleMouseLeave = (type) => { setTooltips((prev) => ({ ...prev, [type]: false })); }; // État pour gérer l'affichage des tooltips const [tooltips, setTooltips] = useState({ Postaladdress: false, Emailaddress: false, Webaddress: false, Partnumbers: false, ManualRemovalBattery: false, ManualDisassemblyBatteryPack: false, ExtinguishingAgent: false, SafetyMeasures: false, PreConsumerRecycledNickel: false, PreConsumerRecycledCobalt: false, PreConsumerRecycledLithium: false, PreConsumerRecycledLead: false, PostConsumerRecycledNickel: false, PostConsumerRecyclecobat:false, Renewablecontentshare:false, Postconsumerrecycledleadshare:false, Postconsumerrecycledlithiumshare:false, wasteprevention:false, wastebatteries:false, separatecollection:false }); return (

); } export default FormulaireDesignCircularity;
